title: Output Schema for Create List Item Operation
description: Output schema for the create list item operation in the connector.

id.description: The unique identifier of the list item.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the list item was created.

createdBy.description: Information about the user who created the list item.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.

lastModifiedDateTime.description: The date and time when the list item was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: Information about the user who last modified the list item.

displayName.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: The unique identifier of the user.
